articles.description: Novak Djokovic begins his French Open title defence with a solid if not spectacular victory over home hope Pierre-Hugues Herbert.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Novak Djokovic starts Roland Garros with Pierre-Hugues Herbert win

articles.description: The third T20 between England and Pakistan was abandoned without a ball bowled because of rain in Cardiff.
articles.title: England vs Pakistan: Third T20 abandoned because of rain in Cardiff

articles.description: American Lexi Thompson confirms she will retire at the end of the 2024 LPGA Tour season.
articles.title: Lexi Thompson: American to retire at end of season at the age of 29

articles.description: F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the Monaco GP - including Oscar Piastri’s pace, Red Bull's form and potential rule changes.
articles.title: F1 Q&A:  Andrew Benson answers your questions

articles.description: American player Danielle Collins has enjoyed one of the finest seasons of her career. In her first BBC Sport column, she explains why she is retiring.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Danielle Collins on retirement, endometriosis and wanting a normal life

articles.description: After spending an estimated £750m in transfers, what has happened over the last season in the Saudi Arabia Pro League?
articles.title: Ronaldo's record, Gerrard's woes & reduced crowds - what has happened in the Saudi Pro League?

articles.description: The stadium which will host the opening match of the T20 World Cup in Dallas this weekend is hit by severe weather.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Stadium for opening match in Dallas hit by severe weather

articles.description: Ineos is "confident" of finding a solution to allow its clubs Manchester United and French club Nice to compete in next season's Europa League.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ineos confident of solution over Nice in Europa League

articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti guided Real Madrid to the Champions League final with the help of a secret weapon, his son Davide.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti's secret weapon - his son, Davide

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka drops just three games as she beats teenager Erika Andreeva to start her French Open campaign in emphatic style.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Sabalenka and Rybakina win, Alize Cornet loses on final appearance
